text: <!channel> It’s Employee Appreciation Day!!!! Come to Walnut and join us for Cake (and cupcakes)! :partyparrot::tada::shuffleparrot:

<!channel> Per the email I just sent to @all — As you all know, Uncorked is a place where we are working very hard to be an inclusive, supportive, active work environment.  As such, the company thinks it’s important to have a POV on *next Wednesday’s “Day Without a Woman”* because we know how impassioned the entire studio is about these sorts of issues.
<https://www.womensmarch.com/womensday>

So… we are thinking that you may want to support Uncorked's 47% women (!!)  and all the women of Portland? If so, please check out my email with 3 ways you can do that between NOW and next WED. Any Qs let James or I know!

attachments.title: A Day Without a Woman
attachments.fallback: Women's March on Washington: A Day Without a Woman
